The Mychem Handbook
Jérôme PANSANEL jerome.pansanel@iphc.cnrs.fr

13 Feb 2012 0.9.1
The Mychem Handbook is a documentation for the Mychem software. The Mychem software provides a set of functions for handling chemical data within MySQL. Mychem v0.9.1 is based on Open Babel version 2.3.0 (or any later version).
